action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Hashem, Lamosao, Morikawa, Woodson, Shimizu; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Souza; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Iwamoto; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Poepoe.
